item.title: How do I clear cookies for a specific site with one click?
item.author: rayspock@protonmail.com (rayspock)
item.description: I often find that clearing cookies for the website that I’m visiting is a real annoyance because it comes with several steps to use the built-in feature that chrome provides to clear them. Besides, most of the Chrome Extensions will clear all the website data and you will lose all your login details for some websites. If you’re lucky you might be fine with signing in. But the truth is people (at least in my experience) won’t always remember the username/password when needed.
